Package com.fssa.librarymanagement.service

Class CommentService

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.librarymanagement.service.CommentService
public class CommentService extends Object
The CommentService class is responsible for managing comments in a library management system. It provides methods for creating, updating, deleting, and listing comments.
Author:
KishorMuruganandham

  • Method Details

    • createComment

      public Comment createComment (Comment comment) throws ServiceException
      Creates a new comment and validates it before storing it in the database.
      Parameters:
      comment - The comment to be created.
      Returns:
      The created comment.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If an error occurs during the service operation.

    • updateComment

      public boolean updateComment (Comment comment) throws ServiceException
      Updates an existing comment with new information.
      Parameters:
      comment - The comment to be updated.
      Returns:
      true if the comment was successfully updated; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If an error occurs during the service operation.

    • deleteComment

      public boolean deleteComment (int commentId) throws ServiceException
      Deletes a comment by its comment ID.
      Parameters:
      commentId - The unique identifier of the comment to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the comment was successfully deleted; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If an error occurs during the service operation.

    • listCommentsByBook

      public List<Comment> listCommentsByBook (int bookId) throws ServiceException
      Lists all comments associated with a specific book.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The unique identifier of the book.
      Returns:
      A list of comments related to the book.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If an error occurs during the service operation.

    • listAllComments

      public List<Comment> listAllComments() throws ServiceException
      Lists all comments in the library management system.
      Returns:
      A list of all comments.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If an error occurs during the service operation.
